note: Japanese and Korean also have the term 刑事/けいじ/형사
Korean more colloquially uses the native term 날씨
Japanese and Korean do have the term 總統 in a more narrow  historical sense, e.g. Generalissimo or Führer
情報 in Chinese means "(e.g. military) intelligence"
The Japanese term is partially kun'yomi
The Japanese term is fully kun'yomi
